title: Monitor Haul Truck Payload
description: A dispatcher monitors haul truck payloads in real-time to ensure they are being loaded correctly, avoiding underloading (inefficient) and overloading (unsafe).

tasks.description: Review the live feed of payload data from the Fleet Management System.
tasks.expected_outcome: A dashboard shows the payload for each truck as it is loaded.

tasks.description: Receive an alert that truck HT-61 was overloaded by 10% on its last load from shovel SH-203.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher acknowledges the overload alert.

tasks.description: Send a message to the operator of shovel SH-203 to be more careful with the number of passes per truck.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shovel operator receives and acknowledges the feedback.
